changeProposalAmount(uint256).details: allows the proposalAmount (amount proposal has to stake to enter the pool) to be configurable

params.proposalIdentifier: hash of the users new proposal

declareStateOfEmergency().details: Declares a state of emergency and enables emergency withdrawls that are not dependant on any external smart contracts

deposit(uint256).details: Lets a user join DAOcare through depositing

params.amount: the user wants to deposit into the DAOcare pool

distributeInterest(address[],uint256[],a.details: Splits the accrued interest between winners.

params.receivers: An array of the addresses to split between

emergencyWithdraw().details: Immediately lets yoou withdraw your funds in an state of emergency

voteEmergency().details: lets users vote that the a state of emergency should be decalred Requires time lock here to defeat flash loan punks

withdrawDeposit().details: Lets a user withdraw their original amount sent to DAOcare Calls the NoLossDao conrrtact to determine eligibility to withdraw Withdraws the proposalAmount (50DAI) if succesful
